1. Incorrect Wi-Fi password. Check and enter the correct password.
2. Your camera only supports 2.4G networks, and not 5G networks.
3. Unstable network connection. Place your camera and mobile phone as close to the router as possible.
4. If the preceding problems do not exist, reset your camera and try again.

Only one-way communication is available. After you send a voice message, the other party can receive it and then reply you with a voice message.
You and the other party can talk and listen to each other simultaneously.
Speech may be affected by the environment. We recommend that you select one-way or two-way speech according to the actual situation.
Both the device\'s video cloud storage service and video data belong to the family.\nIf you change the device\'s family, you will need to purchase services again.
The mobile phone connects to the device\'s Wi-Fi hotspot and transmits network configuration information to the device.
The mobile phone will broadcast network configuration information. After receiving the information, the device will connect to the router.
Use the camera to scan the QR code on the mobile phone, which contains net-pairing information.

Use a network cable to connect the device to a router. Register and add the device to the cloud.

1. Ensure that the lens is not blocked. If the camera lens has a protective film, remove it before you scan the QR code.\n\n2. Place the app QR code in front of the camera at a distance of 20 cm to 30 cm. Adjust the angle and distance until you hear a prompt.
Why is there no prompt from the camera?
Align the QR code with the camera lens at a distance of 20 cm to 30 cm.\nuntil you hear a prompt.
Use Camera to Scan QR Code

If the app malfunctions or crashes, upload logs to help us better locate and resolve the issue.

In compliance with data privacy and security requirements, servers in different countries or regions are independent from one another. After you change the country or region, device information under your current account will not be migrated to the server in the new country or region. The information will be stored on the current server for only 7 days. Change the country or region with caution.

Select the country or region where you are located, or you may have poor experience using functions of the app. In compliance with data privacy and security requirements, servers in different countries or regions are independent from one another.
Before changing the country or region, read and agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service.
This account exists. Do you want to log in?
The user has been not registered. Do you want to register now?

We pay high attention to the privacy of personal information. To fully present how we collect and use your personal information, we revised the Privacy Policy in detail in compliance with the latest laws and regulations. By clicking I Agree, you agree that you have fully read, understood, and accepted all the content of the revised Privacy Policy. Please take your time to read the Privacy Policy. If you have any questions, please contact us anytime.

Network diagnosis helps us solve network problems more quickly. It takes about 2 minutes.

To connect to the Internet: 

In your mobile phone's WLAN settings, check whether there is any WLAN available.
Check whether the mobile phone is connected to the mobile network and is in service.

If your mobile phone is already connected to a WLAN:

Check whether the WLAN hotspot is connected to the Internet or whether the hotspot allows your device to access the Internet.

Downloading the new firmware...Please wait.\nEnsure that your device is connected to a power supply.

Firmware installation is in progress. The status may not be synchronized in time. Please wait for 1 to 2 minutes, and then go to the Firmware Upgrade page to check whether the firmware is successfully upgraded.
Ensure that the device is fully charged during the firmware download.
Waking up the device. It may take some time. You can do other operations while waiting.
1. Please keep the power of the device connected during the upgrade process. \n2. The device cannot be used during the upgrade process, please be patient.
The upgrade may take a long time. Make sure that the device is fully charged. The device is unavailable during the update.

1. Network access has been enabled for the app.
2. Your network cable is plugged in the correct port.

Unstable network connection. Optimized the network.

Please ensure:
1. The network cable is not damaged and is properly connected.
2. The router is not blocked by metal and has good heat dissipation.
3. Your network service provider is working properly.
Ensure that your phone and device are connected to the same Wi-Fi.\nIf your device and mobile phone are connected to the same Wi-Fi, check whether the network port and UDP settings are correct.
Verify the network configuration. Ensure that the port is not occupied.
The device has poor Wi-Fi signals

Ensure that:
1. The device is not blocked by metal.
2. The distance between the device and router is within 10 m, and there are no two-layer strong occlusions in between.
3. The router is not blocked by metal and has good heat dissipation.

Other devices: Press and hold the reset button for 5s until the indicator flashes slowly. For details about the reset button, see the manual.
